TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add and delete template from summary print report page.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on save template button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save template button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save template button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter template name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter template name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter template name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify template name header.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify template name header.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify template name header.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on open templates button.Capture Screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on open templates button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on open templates button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on open templates button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select template name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select template name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select template name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on open button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on open button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on open button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on delete button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on delete button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on delete button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on yes button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on close button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on close button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on close button.
